programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball travels to Mexico City to learn favorite dinner recipes! Back in the kitchen, we make Salsa Verde and Tortilla Casserole (Pastel Azteca), and Pork in Veracruz Sauce (Puntas a la Veracruzana).

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: The Milk Street team looks for inspiration in London’s Middle Eastern restaurants. Featured recipes include: Jerusalem-Style Mixed Grill Chicken, Cauliflower with Spiced Tahini, and an Almond-Coconut Cake with Cherries and Pistachios.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball heads to Bologna, Italy to learn a simple weeknight menu. Back in the kitchen, we make Italian Flourless Chocolate Torta, Spaghetti Aglio e Olio with Tomatoes and Basil, and Italian Bean Soup with Fresh Pasta.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a dive into Portuguese cuisine! Featured recipes include: Portuguese Sponge Cake; Madeiran Pork with Wine and Garlic (Carne Vinha d’Alhos); Garlic and Cilantro Soup with Chickpeas (Açorda Alentejana).

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Chris Kimball travels to Israel to learn from local cooks. We make Lebanese Baked Kafta with Potatoes and Tomatoes, Hummus with Chipotle Black Beans and Salsa and Yeasted Flatbreads with Za’atar Oil.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Explore different ways that vegetables can become the star of the plate! Vegetarian recipes include: Cauliflower Steaks with Pickled Peppers, Capers and Parmesan; Mushroom and Cheese Quesadillas; Panzanella with Fresh Mozzarella.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street learns recipes inspired by the sweet softball-sized lemons found along the Amalfi Coast of Italy! Featured recipes include: Spaghetti with Lemon Pesto; Lemon and Shrimp Risotto with Fresh Basil; Amalfi-Style Lemon Cake.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Chris Kimball visits Cheryl Day in Savannah, Georgia to learn Southern baking. Featured recipes include: Sweet Potato Cupcakes with Cream Cheese-Caramel Frosting; Glazed Sour Cream and Brown Sugar Bundt Cake; Chocolate Layer Cake.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a look at home cooking in Ho Chi Minh City to learn bold and simple dishes. Featured recipes include: Vietnamese Beef Stew with Star Anise and Lemon Grass; Vietnamese Scallion Sauce; Vietnamese Braised Lemon Grass Chicken.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street looks to Venice’s cucina povera to prepare rustic, yet vibrant dishes! Featured recipes include: Venetian Rice and Peas (Risi e Bisi); Polenta with Shrimp and Tomatoes; Venetian Cornmeal and Currant Cookies.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Christopher Kimball creates Turkish dishes with big flavor! Featured recipes include: Spinach and Cheese Gözleme; Turkish Tomato and Onion Salad; Rib-Eye Steaks with Rosemary and Pomegranate Molasses.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: In this episode, Milk Street creates two delicious yet different chocolate cakes! Featured recipes include: Chocolate-Hazelnut Cream Cake; Swedish “Sticky” Chocolate Cake with Flavored Whipped Cream.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street learns about the cooking traditions of Ukraine’s summer kitchens. Featured recipes include: Chicken Roasted with Garlic-Herb Crème Fraîche; Ricotta-Semolina Cake with Caramelized Apples.

programme.title: Christoher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street takes a fresh look at delicious desserts. Featured recipes include: Chèvre Cheesecake with Black Pepper-Graham Crust; Raspberry Mascarpone Freeform Tart; Yogurt Loaf Cake with Coriander and Orange.
